system.description:
The character is employed by

a university to watch over the students and ensure that they speak only Latin in their colleges and hostels. He is a member of the urban community where the university is located. He may begin play with scores in Latin or Artes Liberales, although a score of more than 1 in Artes Liberales would be rare. He may live with the students if he is unmarried, but if he has a family then he lives with them, possessing keys to the studentsâ€™ housing to allow unannounced entry. It would be very unusual for such a character to be female, but it is not impossible.
